questions.question: Which of these activities sounds most appealing to you?

options.text: Designing a beautiful poster or writing a story
Solving a complex logical puzzle or a math problem
Organizing a successful event or creating a business plan

questions.question: When you encounter a problem, what's your first instinct?

options.text: To understand the emotional and human aspects of the situation
To analyze the data and find the root cause
To find the most efficient and practical solution quickly

questions.question: What kind of work environment do you think you'd thrive in?

options.text: A creative studio or a place that values self-expression
A research lab or a tech company focused on innovation
A corporate office or leading a team towards a common goal

questions.question: You're given a historical topic. What would you rather do?

options.text: Write a compelling narrative about the people involved
Analyze the social and political impact it had

questions.question: Which skill do you want to develop more?

options.text: Public speaking and debating
Visual design and digital art

questions.question: Which of these scientific fields excites you more?

options.text: Understanding the fundamental laws of the universe (Physics, Chemistry)
Working with living organisms and ecosystems (Biology, Environmental Science)
Theoretical research and experiments
Building practical applications and software

questions.question: What aspect of business interests you the most?

options.text: Managing finances, investments, and accounting
Marketing, sales, and understanding customer behavior

questions.question: What role do you see yourself in?

options.text: An expert analyst providing critical data
A manager leading a large team
